description:
The Feel:
Located beside the 54 Acre parkland, this fully renovated four-bedroom family home is set on a large block in an ideal court location. Outstanding workmanship and spacious surrounds provide all the comfort and space required for the ever-evolving needs of a family. Two north-facing living rooms overlook an incredible outdoor haven with salt-chlorinated pool, landscaped gardens with granite boulders and tiki pool deck. Only a short walk to the Barwon Heads Kindergarten, Village Park and skate park, the tranquility and convenience of this location are unrivalled.

The Facts:
-Family haven in Tremont Court - one of the best kept secrets in Barwon Heads!
-Stylish & functional foyer connects the home’s entry to 2 distinctive living areas
-Large main living hub with engineered timber flooring, looks beyond the veranda to the pool
-Timber-lined ceilings & bright bay window invites abundant light into the main living hub
-split system air conditioning & ceiling fans with hydronic heating located in every room of the house
-Shaker-style kitchen with huge walk-in pantry is an entertainer’s dream
-Impressive suite of Smeg appliances & Vintec wine fridge will delight cooks
-Caesarstone benchtops & breakfast bar caters to informal meals
-Privately positioned master bedroom, complete with balcony, large walk-in robe & ensuite
-The children’s wing offers 3 bedrooms, main bathroom & versatile 2nd living/rumpus
-All minor bedrooms are generously proportioned & feature built-in robes & ceiling fans
-Main bathroom features free standing bath, in-situ shower & separate toilet
-Private outdoor space, complete with resort-style pool with granite boulders & outdoor shower
-Sun lovers will love entertaining by the pool, perfect for BBQs & sunset drinks
-The covered deck is the perfect spot to recline & watch the kids at play
-Sizeable laundry room with walk-in linen/storage
-Green thumbs will love the dedicated potting station, raised veggie beds & hot house
-6.5kw Solar panels & 13.5kw Tesla battery
-Substantial driveway leads to oversize DLUG; great workshop & storage space
-Neighbouring parkland with walking track to the school, shops & beach

Owner Loves....
“The court is a wonderful place to raise a family. The location is beyond compare and having the pool makes it hard to leave the house on the weekends.”

*All information offered by Bellarine Property is provided in good faith. It is derived from sources believed to be accurate and current as at the date of publication and as such Bellarine Property simply pass this information on. Use of such material is at your sole risk.
